001package apprepo;
002import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
003import static org.junit.Assert.assertNotNull;
004import org.junit.Before;
005import org.junit.Test;
006
007public class RequestFormTest {
008
009    private NewAppServlet requestForm;
010
011    @Before
012    public void setUp() {
013        requestForm = new NewAppServlet(); // Initialize the request form object
014    }
015
016    @Test
017    public void testGetExternalLink() {
018        // Expected external link (for demonstration purposes, use a dummy URL)
019        String expectedLink = "http://example.com/applicationPage";
020
021        // Call the method that is supposed to return the external link
022        String actualLink = NewAppServlet.getExternalLink();
023
024        // Assertions
025        assertNotNull("The external link should not be null", actualLink);
026        assertEquals("The external link does not match the expected URL", expectedLink, actualLink);
027    }
028}
